traits.locale_text: "Обращайтесь, почтеннейш{mf|ий|ая}! Кто знает, может быть потом тоже как-нибудь старой Риззе подсобите по доброй памяти?" {n}Ризза "подмигивает" вам своим аугментированным глазом.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: "It pains me to hear that, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."

traits.locale_text: "It pains me to hear that, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."

languages.text: “听你这么说，我真的很遗憾，大人。”
languages.original_text: "It pains me to hear that, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."

traits.locale_text: “听你这么说，我真的很遗憾，大人。”
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: 「それを聞くのは胸が痛みますよ、陛下」
languages.original_text: "It pains me to hear that, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."

traits.locale_text: 「それを聞くのは胸が痛みますよ、陛下」
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.original_text: "It pains me to hear that, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."

languages.text: "Es schmerzt mich, das zu hören, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft."
languages.original_text: "It pains me to hear that, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."

traits.locale_text: "Es schmerzt mich, das zu hören, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft."
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: « Et j'en suis navrée, Votre Seigneurie. »
languages.original_text: "It pains me to hear that, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."
